name: Foretold (Relaxed Edition)
description:
This is a reupload of Foretold, That I did for Ludum Dare 50. This is a completed version, once I had a computer running that could complete it

Once every 5 years someone must throw themselves into the Time Fire to appease the Time God. Guess who's turn it is this time! Well, you might not have to, if you can get enough time cubes to warp yourself out of there and let it be someone else's turn for a change.

Controls

Arrow keys to move
